'Ryanair Ltd.' (, , ) is an Irish low-cost airline. Its headquarters is located
on the grounds of Dublin Airport in Swords, County Dublin, Ireland, with its
primary operational bases at Dublin Airport and London Stansted Airports.

Ryanair operates over 300 Boeing 737â800 aircraft. The airline has
been characterised by rapid expansion, a result of the deregulation of the
aviation industry in Europe in 1997 and the success of its low-cost business
model. Ryanair`s route network serves 30 countries in Europe and North Africa. http://www.ryanair.com/en/cheap-flight-
destinations

Ryanair has been subject to criticism of, among other things, its employment
relations, its charging policies, its advertisements, and its customer service,
in particular its treatment of disabled customers.
categories: Airlines of the Republic of Ireland
